title: PERRLA
snippet: Perfect APA, MLA, & Turabian formatting – citations, papers, & references. Save time and reduce stress with PERRLA's automated formatting tools.

title: PERRLA for Word Add-In
snippet: PERRLA has worked with Microsoft Word for over 20 years. Our new Microsoft Word Add-in is the most powerful version yet!

title: APA 7 - perrla.com
snippet: APA 7th Edition papers in PERRLA include updates for all of the secondary paper elements. This includes headings, tables, figures, abstracts, tables of content, and reference annotations.
